titleStmt.title: Lectures vpon the foure first chapters of the prophecie of Hosea Wherein the text is exponded and cleered, and such profitable instructions obserued, and applied, as naturally arise out of this holie Scripture, and are fit for these times. By Iohn Dovvname Bacheler in Diuinitie, and preacher of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Downame, John, d. 1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston [and T. East], for William Welby, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Greyhound,

notesStmt.note: "Kingston pr[inted]. quires A-X; East the rest"--STC.
"Lectures vpon the third chapter of the prophecie of Hosea" begins new pagination.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
